 2003-04982003-04-08,  ,  INDUSTRY,  , 
ActBudget Implementation Act, 1997
PrecisReappointment of JOHN ROBERT EVANS of Toronto, Ontario, to be Chairperson of the board of directors of the Canada Foundation for Innovation, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective May 2, 2003.
